name: Mola- Arcade Space Shooter
description:
Mola is a classic arcade space shooter game. Kill enemies, dodge the particles, take the upgrades along the way, gain shield and make your missiles more powerful. Get the highest score possible. 

- Over 10 enemies and different firing patterns
- Gradually getting harder gameplay
- Addictive and arcade style controllers
- Unique custom made soundtrack.

Share your thought with us by giving us a review and rating!
